bio.name: Your Name
bio.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
bio.about_short: Building exceptional digital experiences with cutting-edge technology. Specializing in modern web development, animations, and user-centric design.
bio.about_long: I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer with a passion for creating exceptional digital experiences. With 5+ years of experience in modern web technologies, I specialize in building scalable, high-performance applications that solve real-world problems.
bio.about_paragraph_2: My approach combines clean code architecture with thoughtful UX design. I'm proficient in React and Next.js for frontend development, with solid backend expertise in Django, Node.js, and database management. I believe in writing maintainable code and creating intuitive user experiences.
bio.about_paragraph_3: Beyond coding, I'm passionate about exploring emerging technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and sharing knowledge with the developer community. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring design trends, experimenting with new frameworks, or working on innovative side projects.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Focus on software engineering and web development
Intensive training in MERN stack and modern development practices
Advanced concepts in JavaScript, React, and performance optimization

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.description: Leading frontend architecture and mentoring junior developers. Implemented advanced animations and improved performance by 40%.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications. Collaborated with UX designers and backend teams to deliver seamless user experiences.

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
